name: Ink Solitaire
description:
Chequered Ink bring you our own take on the classic game of Solitaire!

Arrange the cards in four piles from Ace to King by first sorting them into stacks of descending value and alternating colors in the space below.

Features:

♥ 2 Game Modes: 1 card draw and 3 card draw.
♦ 15 Achievements: Challenge yourself to beat the game.
♣ Accessibility Options: Switch between simple or detailed card faces at any time.
♠ Orientation Independence: Play at any angle, wherever you feel comfortable.
♪ And it's totally FREE!
